headline: Kentucky American Water Granted New Water Rates by Kentucky Public Service Commission
summary: The Kentucky Public Service Commission (PSC) has approved new water rates for Kentucky American Water. The approved rates represent a total annualized revenue increase of approximately $18.2 million.

raw.headline: Kentucky American Water Granted New Water Rates by Kentucky Public Service Commission
raw.summary: The Kentucky Public Service Commission (PSC) has approved new water rates for Kentucky American Water. The approved rates represent a total annualized revenue increase of approximately $18.2 million.

headline: West Virginia American Water President Addresses New Infrastructure Report Card, Urges Collaboration Around Critical Water Infrastructure
summary: Today, the American Society of Civil Engineers (ASCE) released its 2025 Report Card for West Virginia's Infrastructure. Drinking water infrastructure in the state received a D+, with wastewater infrastructure receiving a D.
